name: netsh

procedures: T1090::[netsh] can be used to set up a proxy tunnel to allow remote host access to an infected host.
T1518.001::[netsh] can be used to discover system firewall settings.
T1546.007::[netsh] can be used as a persistence proxy technique to execute a helper DLL when netsh.exe is executed.
T1562.004::[netsh] can be used to disable local firewall settings.

description: [netsh](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0108) is a scripting utility used to interact with networking components on local or remote systems. (Citation: TechNet Netsh)
